title: NEW: IYES – So Crazy
content:
It’s been a little while since we last heard from everyone’s favourite Brighton duo IYES, but they’ve just returned with new track So Crazy and it’s an excellent return to form.

With hints of dance music strewn throughout, the duo have taken their now established electro pop sound and made it ripe for both the radio and the dance floor alike – I’m expecting to see a few remixes popping up soon. A great combination of swirling synths and sharpened vocal hooks, So Crazy has certainly wet the appetite for more. Stream it below:

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
